metadata.name: GLITCHERY VOL1CH1
metadata.description:
GLICTHERY is a comic/film hybrid Artwork that follows the chronicles of Ã‰noe and her friends as they immerse themselves in a web of parallel realms, unraveling a series of mysteries in the quest to rediscover who they really are.

The story takes place in a dystopian world disguised as a utopia, where nothing is as it seems. Realms of overlapping realities, separated by an invisible force the natives call "The Veil".

On this fascinating and innovative format, you will able to collect the Chapters of each Volume, which will allow you to read the story from cover to cover.
